short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to automatically skip the introduction, the ending of many streaming sites, as well as youtube ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Context:

Imagine yourself on a winter evening in your bed. Hands warm under your duvet. Outside, in the room, it is very cold. You have been passionate about a successful series for some time. Unfortunately, the episode ends, another starts, HOWEVER the intro credits also start...

You must then take your hand out of your duvet, to face the freezing temperature, in order to click on that damn button "Skip the intro"...

This is where we come in. With this extension you let us click on these buttons for you.

We support a number of streaming sites, and will add new ones over time.

So keep your hands warm and leave it to us.

Please note SKIPPY is not an ad blocker, but an auto skipper. It will automatically detect which buttons to click on.
